definition: worthy of pride/impressive/enviable/to show contempt for others

sentences.english: That's a relief -- Apple has had an incredible run of success over the last decade.
sentences.chinese: 十年來，蘋果取得了驕人的成績，它的成功有目共睹。

sentences.english: Design Institute in the same industry is of great strength, with enviable performance.
sentences.chinese: 設計院在同行業中具有很強的實力，擁有驕人的業績。

sentences.english: Nam Wan Tunnel ? a project proud of its safety record.
sentences.chinese: 南灣隧道項目一直保持驕人的安全紀錄。

sentences.english: Loosing only to China is something they can proudly tell their friends back home…
sentences.chinese: 僅負於中國的驕人戰績也足可以告慰家鄉父老了。

sentences.english: This college has a long tradition of athletic excellence.
sentences.chinese: 這所大學在田徑運動方面歷來成績驕人。

sentences.english: After years of development efforts and achieved remarkable results.
sentences.chinese: 經過多年的努力發展，取得了驕人成績。

sentences.english: To study the source of these special success and performance is of much significance.
sentences.chinese: 研究這些特殊的驕人成績和表現的來源頗具意義。

sentences.english: After the meal, sporting a toothpick between their teeth, they will be glowing with smug satisfaction .
sentences.chinese: 他飯後銜着一根牙籤，紅光滿面，硬是覺得可以驕人。
